post:
Hello all!

We're back again with a new and different offers with dedicated servers starting from just $20/mo in LAX & MIA. If the offers below aren't up to your requirements please just contact one of our sales staff and we can provide a whole host of options.

Be aware all servers are manually setup and it may take up to 3 business days, for these dedicated servers.

##Los Angeles:

<pre>
Intel X3430 (or similar)
16GB DDR3 RAM
2x2TB HDD 
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (swap to 100Mbit unmetered for $5/mo extra)
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6
</pre>
[$30/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=212&currency=2) - Only 8 in stock

<pre>Intel i3-530 (or similar)
16GB DDR3 RAM
1TB HDD
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit 
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$20/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=198&currency=2) with promo code G4U43LW5XX - Only 1 in stock


<pre>Dual Intel Xeon X5650
64GB DDR3 RAM
2TB HDD 
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$49/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=203&currency=2) - Only 1 left!

/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$45/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=213&currency=2) - 5 in stock

<pre>Intel Core2Quad Q9000
8GB DDR2 RAM
2TB HDD 
5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit Asian Optimised Bandwidth (CN2 GT, China Unicom, China Mobile (NEW!))
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$25/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=211&currency=2) - 20+ in stock

[$20/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=200&currency=2) with promo code G4U43LW5XX - Only 3 in stock

$10/Year [Order Here](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=201&currrency=2)

* New Jersey, USA</pre>
$3/Month [Order Here](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=220&currrency=2)


##Location Information
NJ - Test IP (23.226.128.10/2607:fcd0:ccc0:1000::2) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.ewr.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.ewr.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))
LAX - Test IP (69.12.66.26/2607:fcd0:0:a::2) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))
MIA - Test IP (173.44.32.10/2607:ff48:0:a:b:c:d:666) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.mia.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.mia.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))


Additional Information
All services benefit from Quadranets 3Gbit VEST DDoS protection and benefit from their enterprise grade network. All dedicated servers are eligible for BGP sessions, as well as some eligible VPS VMs (contact us for more information) and bring your own IP.
